Anatomical: Left inferior frontal gyrus and insula

Clinical: Impaired retrieval and comprehension of low frequency single words, semantic deficits for objects and people, surface dyslexia/dysgraphia
Anatomical: Bilateral anterior temporal lobe, usually left>right

Clinical: Word-finding difficulty, sentence repetition/comprehension deficits and phonological dyslexia/dysgraphia
Anatomical: Left inferior parietal lobule and posterior superior temporal gyrus
